subject: Appeal to toll collecting agencies to engage Physically Challenged Person

Dwarka_ New Delhi-110075 NHAI/ 13013/3/02-03/CMD-CO/ Policy on Toll (Vol. X) 05.01.2007 CIRCLLAR NO: NHAICOMMERCIAL OPERATIONS/82 Cornpetent Authority has approved that an appeal should be made to all toll collecting agencies including Bot Concessionaire to engage Physically Challenged Person to the extent possible in or around toll plaza as part of endeavor to asgigt these persons in getting gainful employment on the basis of spirit and guidelines of national objective. In this regard copy of appeal is enclosed for   forwarding the same to all fee   collecting  agencies and BOT Concessionaire concerned, Thanking you, Yours fgithfully, TVishal General Manager (CO) Encl.
